name: The Ultimate Tom Hanks Movies Quiz |   People Themed

questions.text: Shelley Long co-starred with Hanks in which of these movies?
questions.explanation:
The Money Pit.

	It must have seemed a "common sense" pairing: two actors who both had their first "big breaks" in tv sitcoms. (Long starred in "Cheers", Hanks starred in "Bosom Buddies".)

questions.text: A rare misfire for Hanks was "Bonfire of the Vanities". Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Tom Wolfe.

	Popular writer Tom Wolfe wrote a popular novel ... but the critics hated the movie and it died at the box office.

questions.text: Hanks starred with a legendary comedian in "Nothing in Common". Who was this star?
questions.explanation:
Jackie Gleason.

	Gleason was a star from the old days; Hanks was a rising star from the new days.

questions.text: Hanks (and Robert Loggia) performed an interesting musical number in "Big" by dancing on what musical instrument?
questions.explanation:
Piano Keyboard.

	This seems to be one of Tom's most popular movies.

Sally Field.

	This seems like a natural pairing: the boy next door meets Gidget.

questions.text: Hanks got his first big movie role in "Splash". Who directed the film?
questions.explanation:
Ron Howard.

	Daryl Hannah starred as the mermaid.

questions.text: The always solid Ed Harris co-starred with Hanks in which of these movies?
questions.explanation:
Apollo 13.

	Harris isn't one of the astronauts in space with Hanks; he's on the ground, trying to bring the crew home safely. This should have won the Oscar for best movie. ("Braveheart" won.)

questions.text: In "Road to Perdition", Tom's son witnesses a grisly murder. How does this come about?
questions.correct: The boy stows away in a car with Tom
options: The boy was kidnapped by the victim
Tom invites him to go along
Tom wants to break the boy into the business
questions.explanation:
The boy stows away in a car with Tom.

	It's unusual to see Tom (and co-star Paul Newman) in somewhat villainous roles. Be that as it may, it was an enjoyable movie.

questions.text: Which of these movies does NOT include frequent co-star Meg Ryan?
questions.explanation:
A League of Their Own.

	There's no Meg in "League". (And, "there's no crying in baseball!")

questions.text: What role did Hanks have in "Catch Me If You Can"?
questions.explanation:
Lawman.

	Hanks pursues Dicaprio in this easy-to-watch movie.
